welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Samrong, Thailand! Known for its rich culture, stunning temples, and warm hospitality, we invite you to immerse yourself in the city's charm and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and have a memorable time exploring our wonderful city."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Suvarnabhumi Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary international terminal at Suvarnabhumi Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Suvarnabhumi Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Don Muang Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Don Muang Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and follow the instructions to access.
